title: A new Linotype catalog!
content:
Submitted by [dan\_reynolds](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055644/http:/typophile.com/user/1085 "View user profile.") : 9.Feb.2006 1.52am 

**Linotype’s LinoLetter for February 2006 – Undiscovered Font Charms and a New Font Catalog**

Check out the full version of this month’s newsletter at the Linotype website: [http://www.linotype.com/8-38-8-19293/issue200602.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055644/http:/www.linotype.com/8-38-8-19293/issue200602.html "http://www.linotype.com/8-38-8-19293/issue200602.html")

_Content Preview:_ This issue of the LinoLetter opens with a view toward a vigorous and well-received text type family: Bohemia™. Following this is our lighter side – a special cartoon font section. Here we will introduce you to a few clever comic-style fonts. Peer in a bit deeper to discover the extraordinary script face Bergell™, whose mesmerizing elegance and dynamism set it apart from day-to-day fonts. But we’ve saved our best treat for last: our new “Complete Typeface Catalog, A–Z.” Hot off the press, this book is now the standard reference guide for fonts in the Linotype library, presented in a beautifully bound form.

[Read the rest of the Linoletter at Linotype.com!](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055644/http:/www.linotype.com/8-38-8-19293/issue200602.html)

Or, [subscribe to the Linoletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808055644/http:/www.linotype.com/webshop/newsletter.php), and get the information delivered every month directly to your mailbox.
author: dan_reynolds
